dc_title_s: North Atlantic Ocean, South America, Approaches to Suriname River (Raster Image)
dc_description_s: This layer is a georeferenced raster image of a portion of a scanned nautical chart showing the approaches to Suriname River. This map is part of a nautical chart titled "North Atlantic Ocean, South America, Approaches to Suriname River" originally published by the United States National Imagery and Mapping Agency in 1998. This layer is 1 of 2 parts representing the original source sheet map. Map No. 24375.Historic paper maps can provide an excellent view of the changes that have occurred in the cultural and physical landscape. The wide range of information provided on these maps make them useful in the study of historic geography, and urban and rural land use change. As this map has been georeferenced, it can be used in a GIS as a source or background layer in conjunction with other GIS data.
dc_creator_sm: United States. National Imagery and Mapping Agency
